original_title: Justice Minister Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe yesterday engaged in a dialogue with civil society
original_body_lines: Justice Minister Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe yesterday engaged in a dialogue with civil society activists on the anti-terror draft bill at the ministry premises. The meeting was attended by Prof. Rohan Samarjiva, Sunil Jayasekara, Nimalka Fernando, Jehan Perera and others.
